name: myopia (Space Fungus Games)
description:
myopia is a ruthless platformer with explosive movement and a striking, vhs-infused, 1-bit visual style. embark on a journey into a world long abandoned and venture through increasingly hostile environments.

myopia was created for the Jame Gam 18 by @clonetrash and @SnekOfSpice. see in-game for more detailed credits.
